meanings.definition: Distributing or allocating resources, wealth, or goods in a different way.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is redistributing the crayons among the students.
meanings.sent2: The government is redistributing funds to support education.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was redistributing its acorn stash all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: The wind was redistributing the fallen leaves across the park.
meanings.sent5: The chef was redistributing the toppings on the pizza to ensure each slice had an equal amount.

meanings.definition: To give out or share something again in a different manner.
meanings.sent1: She is redistributing the cookies to make sure everyone gets some.
meanings.sent2: The charity organization is redistributing donated clothes to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The magician was redistributing the playing cards in a surprising way.
meanings.sent4: The artist was redistributing the colors on the canvas to create a new pattern.
meanings.sent5: The librarian was redistributing the books on the shelves to make space for new arrivals.
